name: Crown Token
description: What is the project about? CROWN is the very first global entertainment token by bridging traditional intellectual properties (IPs) with blockchain technology to enhance the business and create additional value to CROWN Token holders and the community. What makes your project unique? History of your project. CROWN token offers an attractive exposure to all platforms in our ecosystem spanning across the entertainment, tech, and media industries. CROWN BRINGS AN EXCLUSIVE JOURNEY TO NFTs AND THE METAVERSE Whatâ€™s next for your project? Our vision is to become a leading and innovative platform that connects people of all generations across the globe through media, entertainment, and technologies. Our mission is to revolutionize digital solutions for people around the world with boundless exchanges and communication, cultural appreciation, and deep engagement What can your token be used for? We aim to provide attractive use cases, greater diversification, and global market exposure to our token holders. Our use cases are driven by 1) intellectual property projects and its adjacent businesses like games, licensing and merchandising, NFTs, comics, theme parks; 2) ADOT platform, our proprietary NFT marketplace with a revenue/transaction fee sharing program; and 3) our strong ecosystem from our family of companies and partners.
